function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Reduction in office space provision","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shift towards soft renovation instead of major refurbishment projects","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective social distancing measures in the workplace","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate workplace health and safety monitoring","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient support for remote working employees","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective risk management in workplace operations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate collaboration between different company segments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective response due to lack of previous experience with risk management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain future due to pandemic duration and vaccine availability","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Portfolio transformation and technology adoption","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Variation in office workplace modification activities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low adoption of engineering control activities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uneven compliance with community measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for covid-19 infection cases in the office workplace","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research on office workplace pandemic control","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate workplace modification activities at the operational level","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on administrative control and personal protection for risk control","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of workplace guidance for covid-19 management","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate infection prevention measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with lockdown procedures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased transmission of covid-19 in the eu/eea and the uk","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of risk identification and assessment for covid-19 in the workplace","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absence of workplace guidelines for coping with covid-19 community measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced degree of openness in the office workplace","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Work from home becoming the norm","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear restructuring based on headcounts analysis may lead to ineffective implementation of distancing and personal protection measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of work from home wfh without proper planning and infrastructure may lead to decreased use of office space and potential for viral spread in home environments.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of alignment between physical office space and organizational needs may lead to ineffective workplace modifications and increased risk of disease spread.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on pandemic control in non-clinical workplace theory","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on virtual office space without proper management and safety measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate workplace modification practice for pandemic control","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease spread in the workplace due to lack of effective modification plans and alignment with strategic changes.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of alignment between business strategies and workplace modification plans, leading to increased risk of contagious disease spread.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent implementation of workplace modification activities, leading to varying levels of risk for contagious disease spread within the organization.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 pandemic on businesses reliant on office workplace","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative impact of social distancing on office atmosphere and employee collaboration","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete understanding of the influence of occupant behavior on air change rate.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in estimating indoor air pollutant concentrations due to variability in air change rates.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupant window-opening behavior affecting air change rates","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High air change rates from window-opening behavior","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Measuring variability in air change rate due to window-opening behavior","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited studies quantifying the effect of opening windows on the air change rate in homes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hvac system using 100% recirculated air with no fresh air intake","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent opening and closing of windows and doors during experiments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of measurement of outdoor and indoor temperatures and wind speed during air change experiments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of wind data at a height of 3.05 m in the backyard only","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Recirculated air in hvac system","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negligible air exchange between adjacent townhouses","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Greater temperature range between winter and summer","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation due to air change rate experiments and no noticeable wind","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
